title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 70.2 - Waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 70.2 - Waivers

State Regulations

For good cause shown to its satisfaction, the authority
may grant waivers to licensees adversely affected by section
55-b
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law
or this Part, under such terms and conditions as the authority deems
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
70.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
